Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer's unbeaten 74 off 44 balls trumped Pathum Nissanka's 75 off 53
Ravindra Jadeja's 45 not out off 18 outshone Dasun Shanaka's 47 not out off 19
India lost Rohit Sharma in the first over of the chase and were 56 for 2 after eight overs
Shreyas Iyer hit six fours and four sixes in his unbeaten 74
Jadeja did the bulk of the scoring from the 13th over on, and handed India a comfortable win in the end
Post-Match Reflections: The win, India's 11th on the trot in T20Is, gave the hosts an unassailable 2-0 lead in the series
Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's sedate start with only 15 runs and one boundary in the first four overs
India's batters making the most of their chances as per Jaffer
Shreyas Iyer's aggressive knock which included six fours and four sixes in his unbeaten 74
Jadeja's brilliant direct hit to dismiss Steve Smith was not mentioned but he did play an aggressive knock which included 45 not out off 18 balls
Shreyas Iyer's back-to-back sixes off Praveen Jayawickrama in the 9th over
Others: The match was played in Dharamsala, India
India chased down Sri Lanka's 183 for 5 with seven wickets and 17 balls to spare
The match was the second T20I in the series
